general.demo_title: MaskSim: Detection of synthetic images by masked spectrum similarity analysis
general.description:
This demo is for predicting whether the input image is generated by each of the following models:

  • Stable Diffusion 1.x
  • Stable Diffusion 2
  • Stable Diffusion XL
  • DALL·E 2
  • DALL·E 3
  • Midjourney
  • Firefly

For each generative model, a result based on false positive rate (FPR) calibration is given:

  • If FPR < 0.01: PROBABLE
  • If 0.01 ≤ FPR < 0.05: LIKELY
  • If 0.05 ≤ FPR < 0.1: POSSIBLE
  • If 0.1 ≤ FPR: no evidence

 

WARNING: Resized generated images cannot be detected.
